description: City of New Orleans Permits (March 2004 to March 2012).  ESRI shapefile format, GIS software required for viewing geometry (http://www.esri.com/software/arcgis/arcreader/).  Tabular data (DBF), included as part of the shapefile, are viewable in Excel.  Large dataset - 400,000+ records. Associated spreadsheet 'Permits_3PrimeDomain' lists domains for three of the primary permit fields. Scheduled update: Quarterly

metadata.attribution: City of New Orleans - Department of Information Technology & Innovation
